meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Todd Hueta Lauri Donahue Jack Koenig Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #879.

td.p: Todd Hueta, a student from Sunnyvale, California
Lauri Donahue, a lawyer from San Francisco, California
Jack Koenig, an actor and househusband from New York City, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $15,399)

tr.td: WORLD HISTORY
AIRPORTS
'60s SONGS
BEAUTY SECRETS
THE ELEMENTS
TV GUIDE SAYS
